overview: Depending on the time and circumstances, nations may choose to live in a variety of new planets for their comfort. However, everyone's mutual goal is to reunite people who have been separated by unfortunate circumstances. The key to the reunification of all human beings is to explore a whole new world with the same function as the previous one.
tagline: The new challenges awaits in the new world for the people of the previous. The place entitled 'Ananda'
title: Ananda: Rise of Notra
